name: Educational beacons
tagline: Android application that portrays the use of beacons in both secure and insecure settings.
body:
### Introduction
In the ever increasing field of technology, new technology is bound to pop up. For the average person, contextual technology is becoming more and more impacting in their lives. Whether it's social media applications asking them to make a post in the event of a disaster so that their family knows they're ok to a simple "I'm at the coffee shop!" post.

### Our application
We have developed a solution that enables any university to reliably relay information to their students through an application that once it detects a beacon, it will notify the user. The information will be a tap away.

### Features

* Eddystone-URL support
* Eddystone-EID support
* Configurable, just declare what URL the application should look after

### Authors and Contributors
This project was created by Mario Canul under Debasis Bhattacharya from a grant from the National Science Foundation

### Support or Contact
If there are any questions or concerns, please email mcanul@hawaii.edu
